events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't fit properly.
The reported issue involves a refund request due to sizing problems with the product.
Assigning this refund case to the customer service specialist team for resolution.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I'm here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Yes, my order number is 8675309. The jacket is unworn and still has the tags attached and original packaging intact.
We have initiated your refund request. Please ship the jacket back to us using the prepaid return label we will email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate how clearly you explained the return process and look forward to receiving the label.
Your refund case is now resolved. Once we receive the returned jacket, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to see if you have shipped back the jacket and if everything is going smoothly with your refund.
We have received your returned jacket and completed the refund process. Thank you for your patience, and we hope to serve you again.
